alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:01AM CDT until July 12 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Holt County in north central Nebraska... Southeastern Boyd County in north central Nebraska... Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 400 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Verdel to 6 miles south of Amelia, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... O`neill, Burwell, O`Neill, Atkinson, Ewing, Chambers, Lynch, Page, Bartlett, Ericson, Amelia, Inman, Emmet, Monowi, Virginia Smith Dam, Carson Lake, Sunfish Lake, Four Corners, Opportunity and Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 288 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 133 and 205. Highway 12 between mile markers 132 and 144. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across the warned area. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
